Body Lab Bali is a state-of-the-art medical spa located in the heart of Seminyak, offering the latest in non-surgical cosmetic treatments.

Administered by experienced medical professionals and therapists, we use only scientifically-proven technology and dermatologist-approved products to deliver lasting results.

Anti-Aging Facials

Younger, radiant skin

From Thermolift radio frequency facials to ultrasound treatments and enzyme peels, we use the latest aesthetic technology and products to reveal healthier, more youthful skin. Whatever your skin concerns, our experienced staff can help you find the perfect treatment for you. Your skin deserves nothing less.

Body Sculpting

Slim, tone and smooth

Who doesn't want a tight, toned body? We've perfected a range of non-surgical treatments to assist in weight loss, skin smoothing and cellulite reduction. Our proven slimming therapies use technology like fat freezing, vacuum roller and 3D Slimming machines to get you the results you want fast.

Injectable Rejuvenation

QUALITY AND SAFETY

It's important that injectable treatments like Botox are only administered by experienced medical professionals. At Body Lab Bali we hire only the best, and use internationally certified products to ensure natural-looking results.

Only the Best

Years of experience

Our highly trained therapists and experienced medical professionals provide the safest procedures using the latest technologies in the cosmetic industry. We remain committed to providing high a quality service to our patients.

Seminyak's Top Medical SPA

 

Body lab is one of the leading cosmetic clinics in Bali. Their certified medical practitioners use only internationally-accredited cosmetic brands.

Happy Customers

Body Lab | Seminyak Bali

Body Lab is a medical spa located in the heart of Seminyak, Bali. We offer a variety of beauty and skincare treatments customised to your needs. Our highly trained therapists are providing the safest procedures and imlpementing the latest technologies in the beauty industry.
